extendedInfo.description: Discover West Town. The name says it all! This app will help you find local coffee hangouts, vintage shops, gastro pubs, boutiques, parks, schools and more - all around the West Town area. Discover West Town will use your current location to find results based on what you're looking for. This App Contains: * West Town business directory * Discover feature to find new hip restaurants & retailers * Integration feature to share your discoveries on Facebook * Local Special Events & Festivals * Hot Deals, sales and specials * Community Resources * And More! Facebook integration allows you to share what great places you've discovered by clicking our âDiscoverâ button. Quickly find a businessâ Facebook/Twitter page and follow effortlessly. West Town is a neighborhood destination which thrives on the principles of community and the subsequent charm created by this diverse, yet united area. West Town is defined by a rich history of residents and the entrepreneurial pioneers whoâve helped maintain the essence of what truly defines âChicagoââ¦its neighborhoods. West Town is one of Chicagoâs original 77 Community Areas established in the 1920s; made up of many neighborhoods, including Wicker Park, Ukrainian Village, East Village, Humboldt Park, Eckhart Park, Noble Square & River West. Get to know West Town and its diverse offerings. Sometimes trendy, but far from pretentious; these West Town retailers, restaurants, bars and services are truly unique and weave the wonderfully diverse fabric of our community. Discover West Town NOW and see what everyoneâs been raving about!
